page.title: 05Mark Noden's School Day
page.content: I wake up at 7:00am and get dressed.At 7:15am I have my breakfast.At 7:35am I get my school gear ready.At 7:50am I clean my teeth and at 7:55am I feed my rabbit.At 8:00am I set off for Joan Salter's house.At 8:45am I leave her house to go to school.At 8:50am I play outside with my friends for 10 minutes. We play foxes and rabbits.At 9:00am I put my lunch box in the big box with all the others and sit down to read for 20 minutes.After that we write a story. At 10:15am we have assembly until 10:40 am.At 10:40am we go outside for morning break.We come indoors at 11:00am.We finish our story and go onto maths.At 12:00am we have lunch and at 12:20am we go out and play cricket.We return at 1:00pm and at 1:30 I usually do nature diary.At 2:45 we have a story and at 3:00pm we go home.
